recipesJson.name: 3 Peanuts: Simple Peanut Butter Cheesecake
recipesJson.author: MrColdOne
recipesJson.description: Another simple 3 ingredient recipe, (all TFA) here is my simple Peanut Butter Cheesecake recipe. I like to make this with 1% FLV PB and 1% LA Cream Cheese Icing added but it's still a great recipe as is, and a great recipe for those who don't like to add in a bunch of flavors. Feel free to add sweetener to taste. Just to be clear this is a shake and vape recipe. In my opinion, peanut butter dies and kind of taste bland after a steep. So again this is formulated as a shake and vape only, and is best right away.

reviews.text: For me, this was a little bland. Not bad, not great, a great start to something that can pop with a touch of work. I may try it adding just a touch of sweetener and a few drops of saline. But thank you MrColdOne for showing me that I have an interest in these flavor combinations and I hope to hear your thoughts and or revisions on this recipe.

Added the optional ingredients and was very surprised by this recipe, very nice change of pace. Not sure why people would rate this recipe so low after an extended steep, the recipe clearly says SNV, pretty sure it's common sense to follow a recipe exactly if you're going to judge it. This is one of my favorite mixes in a good while.
This was quite awful after an extended steep, not sure why. I did add the optional ingredients, fyi. I expected more from you MrColdOne.
A little on the sweet side for me but I'm enjoying it after a two week steep.

this is a solid PB cheese cake i did add the FLV PB  and the LA cream cheese icing all and all its nice not to heavy every day i try to pick a recipe at random to mix and this one i truly have enjoyed bravo sir bravo
